name: The City of Forgotten Toys
description:
The City of Forgotten Toys is a platformer where you collect discarded toys and put them in the donation box.  Toys that are discarded in the real world end up in the City of Forgotten Toys, by donating the toys you get them back to the real world.  The City is run by a corrupt Mayor, whose main goal is to have the population grow, in order to increase his power and wealth.

Controls:

Left and Right Arrows or A and D to move left and right.

Space to Jump.

Goal:

Collect the toys by colliding with them and placing them in the box.  Avoid the tennis balls being shot at you.  If you are lucky maybe you will be able to confront the Mayor.
